explains: n. 控告，指责，谴责；（尚未证实的被控告的）罪名，罪状

sentences.en: She was deeply pained by the accusation.
sentences.cn: 这一指控使她极为痛苦。

sentences.en: He took the ridiculous accusation in stride.
sentences.cn: 他从容应对那荒谬的指控。

sentences.en: Clarke swung at his shadow the accusation that he was "a tabloid politician."
sentences.cn: 克拉克指责其在野对手为“煽情政客”。
